lesson: Unit 5 - Discussing the Impact of Technology on Society Quiz

questions.question: What is one positive impact of technology on society?
answers: It improves communication and access to information.
questions.correct: It improves communication and access to information.

questions.question: What is one negative impact of technology?
Why is the internet important for education?
answers: It provides access to resources and online courses.
questions.correct: It provides access to resources and online courses.

questions.question: How can technology affect work environments?
answers: It allows remote work and collaboration.
questions.correct: It allows remote work and collaboration.

questions.question: What is a challenge caused by technology in society?
Why is digital literacy important today?
answers: It allows people to use technology effectively and safely.
questions.correct: It allows people to use technology effectively and safely.

questions.question: How can technology benefit healthcare?
answers: Through improved medical treatments and patient monitoring.
questions.correct: Through improved medical treatments and patient monitoring.

questions.question: What is one risk associated with social media?
Why is cybersecurity important for society?
answers: It protects sensitive information and privacy.
questions.correct: It protects sensitive information and privacy.

questions.question: How can technology help the environment?
answers: Through sustainable practices and resource management.
questions.correct: Through sustainable practices and resource management.

questions.question: What is one impact of technology on education?
answers: Online learning and global access to knowledge.
questions.correct: Online learning and global access to knowledge.

questions.question: Why is digital accessibility important for society?
answers: It ensures equal access for all people.
questions.correct: It ensures equal access for all people.

questions.question: What is one benefit of online collaboration platforms?
answers: They enable teamwork regardless of location.
questions.correct: They enable teamwork regardless of location.

questions.question: How can technology affect mental health?
answers: Excessive screen time can cause stress and anxiety.
questions.correct: Excessive screen time can cause stress and anxiety.

questions.question: Why is responsible use of technology important?
answers: To minimize its negative impacts and maximize benefits.
questions.correct: To minimize its negative impacts and maximize benefits.
